alert.note: Alert for Clark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:22PM EDT until July 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clark County in west central Ohio... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Springfield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Harmony and Buck Creek State Park. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 57 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
